channel.title: Staff - Choose Spell
channel.description: Hi, Does someone know how to choos a spell with a staff. When i push on the book it to choose a spell it only let me see it for 1 sec. Than it goes away [hr] [glow=red,2][size=14pt]Reward : Mod on my server 90 mil phats and 2000 mil coins....[/size][/glow] [hr] RuneSpace.No-Ip.Org
